title: Grinder Setting Guide
description: Get a recommended grind setting for your Arco grinder based on brew method, bean origin, and roast level. A precise starting point saves beans and gets you to a great cup faster.
formula: Each grinder has a numeric setting range. Base settings per brew method are defined from factory calibration data. Roast level shifts the setting (lighter roasts need finer grind for same extraction; darker roasts extract faster so go coarser). Bean density by origin applies a secondary offset. African and Central American beans tend to be harder/denser (grind slightly finer); Asian beans and dark roasts are more porous (grind coarser).
